changeSet.author: me
changeSet.sql:
create table song_data ( song_id bigint generated by default as identity, user_name varchar(255), upload_date timestamp, path varchar(255), artist varchar(255), song_name varchar(255), opt_song_name varchar(255), fonetic_hash varchar(10), duration integer not null, quality varchar(255), size varchar(255),
primary key (song_id) );
